name: teelogging
description: simple logging simultaneous to file and screen using basic macros LOGI, LOGD, LOGV, LOGW, LOG and LOGF

scripts.install: node node_modules/cmaki/call.js clean && node node_modules/cmaki/call.js setup && node node_modules/cmaki/call.js compile
